title: How to Print a Message in Holding Bay
body:
Follow these steps to Print a Message in the Holding Bay:
Navigate to Secure Messaging
Click the Mailbox icon



Make sure you are in the 'Holding' section
Click the Tick-Box next to the message of which you want to print


5. Click More, Then click Print



Please Click here if you would like to know How to Assign Messages to Patients & Providers

If you need further assistance please contact support on 1300 103 903 or email at support@medirecords.com
